body.name: Yaheetech Office Chair High Back Wide Seat Executive Chair Adjustable Desk Chair, PU Leather Managerial Swivel Chair w/Padded Armrest, Big and Tall
deliveryMessages: $9.99 delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 7 mins.
features: 【COMFORTABLE AND ROOMY】: Our faux leather office chair is designed for ultimate comfort. The seat measures 20 inches (width) x 19.5 inches (depth) and is padded with high-density foam, which provides you a larger sitting area and relieves fatigue from a long time sitting.

【TALL BACKREST & PADDED ARMREST】: Featuring a 64cm/25.2inch high backrest, this office chair gives reasonable upper and lower back support and the integrated headrest allows you to rest your head on as wanted. Foam padded armrests add extra comfort for your office hours.

【STURDY CONSTRUCTION】: This high-back executive chair is built of premium PU leather upholstery, durable plywood frame and strong plastic base, providing you a steady sitting experience. With a 136kg/300lb weight capacity, this chair is suitable for most individuals.

【CLASSIC FAUX LEATHER FINISH】: Unlike normal office chairs, this home office chair painstakingly selects smooth PU leather and plastic star base for a luxurious but sleek look. Edge layering design and horizontal stitch create a stylish cushioned look.

【DURABLE SWIVEL CHAIR】: This chair is equipped with nylon swivel casters to make sure users can move with the chair effortlessly with a 360 degrees rotation. Durable materials of these 5 casters allow a smooth and steady mobility. SGS approved gas spring also ensures your safe sitting experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thinking of something new for your office or bedroom? A cozy and elegant PU leather chair can be a nice choice. PU leather-covered chair is both easy to clean and long wearing. A durable steady frame makes sure our customers enjoy comforts and relaxing sitting. The seat height is adjustable according to individual needs. To add more fun in an office chair, the center-tilt tension is also adjustable for users to rock back and forth. Upholstered padded seat and high back help release your muscle tension during long office hours. Mute castors allow 360° smooth mobility without scratching the floor. This simple and classic desk chair is ready to visit your room!

Yaheetech Office Desk Chair Modern Executive Task Chair Specifications: Materials: PU leather, Sponge, Plywood, PP Color: Black Overall Dimension: 27'' L × 28.5'' W× 40-44'' H Seat Height: 18-21.5'' Weight Capacity: 300lb Please note: Please allow±1.5cm/0.6inch errors in seat height due to manual measurements. Why We Choose This Yaheetech Office Desk Chair? STURDY CONSTRUCTION COMFORTABLE AND ROOMY CLASSIC FAUX LEATHER FINISH TALL BACKREST & PADDED ARMREST ERGONOMIC DESIGN MULTI FUNCTION AND MOVABLE BIG AND WIDE SEAT EASY ASSEMBLY
Featuring an ergonomic design, this computer chair will perfectly fit your body shape when sitting on and provide you with proper lumbar support. Bring you ultimate comfort during long working days.

360-degree computer desk chair brings convenience for you to move from task to task, which also reduces backaches and pains from long time sitting in a static chair. Swivel feature allows you to converse with people sitting in all directions without physically turning around and standing up.
The water-resistant PU leather surface allows the desk chair to be easily wiped clean with a simple damp cloth and a few drops of cleansers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation, comfortable and reasonable pricing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chair is good, but weight limit is only 220lbs, not 300 as it says in the listing
reviews.reviewText: Chair was delivered quickly and was fairly easy to put together, but I was disappointed to see that the instruction manual that came with the chair indicates the maximum weight limit is only 220 lbs (102 kg) and NOT the 300 lb. load that is noted in multiple places on the Amazon listing. I specifically bought this chair because of the higher weight limit and so am very disappointed to find that I was lied to. It seems to be fine and has no trouble bearing my 230 lb body, but I can't help but wonder if the heavier weight load will shorten the overall life of the chair. Other than that misleading detail, the chair seems well constructed and is quite comfortable. Hopefully it will continue to hold up...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars COMFORTABLE + GREAT DESIGN
reviews.reviewText: I have never been good at assembling items and my dad had to help me. It was a little bit of a struggle trying to get the back of the chair into the arm rests. It took both of us to line up properly to avoid one side popping back out as the screws were being put in. The FINAL outcome was worth it and GREAT on my lower back!!!! 👍🏽 Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, AWFUL casters
reviews.reviewText: Chair itself is fine. Nothing great but very comfortable for a low priced office chair that I'd bet is gonna only last about a year. That's all fine. The wheels/casters on it though... wow. Just the lowest quality possible. Never really pivot right. More scrape then slide. Basically 1/4" thin plastic strips and not wheels. If you're on hardwoods or anything like that, steer clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Expensive but Affordable
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together taller than most Chairs great Leather Feel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars you get what you pay for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The styling on the chair is great and it is extremely comfortable when you work from home and are sitting at your desk all day.
